apis_researched.description: Comprehensive financial and ESG data API providing access to fundamental data, as-reported indicators, and market intelligence across global markets

endpoints.description: Access fundamental financial data for companies globally
endpoints.response_format: JSON with company fundamentals and metadata

endpoints.description: Market-moving economic indicators as originally reported
endpoints.response_format: JSON with as-reported data and publication dates

endpoints.description: ESG scores and metrics for covered companies
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG scores and methodology details

pricing_info.enterprise_features: Custom data feeds, bulk downloads, dedicated support
pricing_info.contact_info: Sales inquiry through S&P Global website

access_requirements.technical_requirements: API key management, secure data handling

apis_researched.description: Automated ESG data collection and reporting platform with pre-filled data and consent-based access for financial institutions

endpoints.description: Retrieve company ESG profile and sustainability data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG metrics and verified documentation links

endpoints.description: Access emissions data including Scope 1, 2, and 3 estimates for 45,000+ companies
endpoints.response_format: JSON with emissions data and model transparency metrics

endpoints.description: Climate risk analytics and decarbonization progress tracking
endpoints.response_format: JSON with climate risk metrics and ITR analytics

pricing_info.pricing_type: Tiered pricing by data access and usage
pricing_info.enterprise_features: Advanced ML models, comprehensive coverage, regulatory compliance support
pricing_info.contact_info: Contact through ESG Book website for pricing

access_requirements.technical_requirements: Secure API integration, consent-based data access

apis_researched.description: Industry-leading ESG ratings and risk analytics covering 17,000+ issuers and 999,000+ securities with 25+ years of ESG expertise

endpoints.description: Retrieve MSCI ESG ratings (AAA to CCC scale) for companies and securities
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG ratings, scores, and methodology details

endpoints.description: Access detailed ESG scores across 35 key issues and pillars
endpoints.response_format: JSON with pillar scores, key issue ratings, and peer comparisons

endpoints.description: Portfolio-level ESG analysis and risk metrics
endpoints.response_format: JSON with portfolio ESG metrics and risk exposures

documentation_sections.sdks_libraries: Python, R, and JavaScript SDKs available

pricing_info.enterprise_features: Real-time data feeds, historical time series, custom analytics
pricing_info.contact_info: MSCI Client Services and Sales teams

access_requirements.compliance_requirements: MSCI data license compliance, usage restrictions

apis_researched.description: Comprehensive ESG risk ratings and research platform with two-phase authentication and extensive coverage of ESG risk factors

endpoints.description: Authentication endpoint - first phase of two-phase authentication
endpoints.response_format: JSON with session token and expiration details

endpoints.description: Retrieve company ESG risk ratings and detailed assessments
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG risk scores, ratings, and detailed analysis

endpoints.description: Access engagement services data and milestone tracking
endpoints.response_format: JSON with engagement status and milestone data

documentation_sections.sdks_libraries: Not specified - REST API with examples

pricing_info.enterprise_features: Full resultsets, higher rate limits, bulk data access

access_requirements.compliance_requirements: Data usage compliance, rate limiting adherence
access_requirements.technical_requirements: Two-phase authentication, token management, recommended async implementation

apis_researched.description: AI-powered reputational risk and responsible business conduct data combining advanced AI with expert human analysis for due diligence and compliance

endpoints.description: Access company reputational risk profiles and RepRisk Index (RRI) scores
endpoints.response_format: JSON with RRI scores, risk incidents, and trend analysis

endpoints.description: Detailed risk incident data with AI analysis and expert tagging
endpoints.response_format: JSON with incident details, sources, and impact assessment

endpoints.description: Bulk screening capabilities for due diligence and compliance
endpoints.response_format: JSON with screening results and risk flags

pricing_info.pricing_type: Contact Sales - Data as a Service model

research_summary.free_tier_availability: None of the researched APIs offer free tiers - all require enterprise licensing
key_observations: All APIs require enterprise-level licensing and approval processes
Pricing information is generally not publicly available - requires sales contact
Strong focus on compliance and data governance requirements
Most providers offer evaluation periods or demos for qualified prospects
Documentation quality varies - some providers have comprehensive public docs while others restrict access to licensed clients

research_limitations.documentation_access: Some API documentation requires licensed access
research_limitations.pricing_transparency: Most pricing requires direct sales contact
research_limitations.endpoint_details: Detailed endpoint specifications may vary from public documentation
research_limitations.authentication_specifics: Some authentication details require developer account access
